Package appication

Class DataBaseModel

java.lang.Object
appication.DataBaseModel
public class DataBaseModel extends Object
Contains the methods for managing the connection to the database.
Author:
xaviernoel, jonathanmartin, morris

    • getRightLogin

      public static boolean getRightLogin(String username, String userpassword) throws SQLException
      This method get access to login.
      Parameters:
      username - name of user.
      userpassword - password of user.
      Returns:
      and true if usename(primary key) if exist.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception if connection is not established.

    • getUsersQuestion

      public static String getUsersQuestion(String username)
      This method get the question from the table. This method is used during the changing password face. The user before to able to get access to the change passwrod form he/she must to pass the secury answer. This method get the question chose by user from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - is is the primary key of tha table. it used to get the question match to the user.
      Returns:
      the question matched to the user. The method throw exceptipon that will be handled by the controller.

    • checkAnswer

      public static boolean checkAnswer(String username, String answer)
      This method check if the asnwer if same to the one insert. If the answer is different of the one saved onto database the will return false. if answer is false the handle controller it will pop up error text.
      Parameters:
      username - login username.
      answer - is security answer.
      Returns:
      true is the answer match whith one in the system.

    • checkUserName

      public static boolean checkUserName(String username)
      This method check if the username is in the table. This method is used by loging page and sign up page. the sign up and login page use this method to check if a user already exist or not.
      Parameters:
      username - login username.
      Returns:
      true is user deas not exisit.

    • overridePassword

      public static void overridePassword(String username, String password)
      This method check is username exist if so it will update the password. This method is use by change password form to verfied it a user exist or not. if so, it will update the database with the new password.
      Parameters:
      username - the primary key used check if username exist and then used to update password releated to the username.
      password - is the password update.
